name: Lab City
description:
King Monke needs your help. After a bizarre lab accident, now-sentient mutant animals are learning how to survive in the ruins of the lab. Comfort them, and teach them how to farm and read so they can survive in their new city.

Made for the Crossover Jam. Because of that, certain events and characters from other Crossover Jam games are mentioned in Lab City.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move. Space to talk/interact.
